newsitem.title: USA: IPO PRICING - 2Connect units price at $12.50.
newsitem.headline: IPO PRICING - 2Connect units price at $12.50.

text.p: Lead Underwriter Stern Agee & Leach Inc
NOTE: The proposed number of units was lowered for the planned initial public offering in 2Connect Express Inc but the target price was raised.

The proposed number of units was lowered to 520,000 units each consisting of two common shares and one warrant from 700,000 units each consisting of three common shares and one warrant. Previously 850,000 units were on offer. Originally, the company proposed one million shares under its original lead underwriter Sovereign Equity Management.

The estimated target price was raised to $12.50 per unit from $9.25 previously. Originally, an estimated price range of $6 to $8 per share was proposed under lead underwriter Sovereign Equity Management.
Units will trade under the symbol.
